prerequisite: NUS Compulsory Core Curriculum or its equivalent. A foundational course on constitutional and administrative law (from either a common law or some other jurisdiction). For non law students from FASS (Political Science -with at least 80 MCs)
moduleDescription: Course explore the structures, histories, purposes and justifications for public law (i.e., constitutional and administrative law) from the perpective of Anglo-American, continental European, and selected Asia legal traditions.
